attributes.action: Restrict HGV from overtaking between rush hour times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Restrict all HGV from overtaking on motorways and dual carriage ways between
07:00–09:00 & 16:00 to 18:00

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
